description: bd graph supports multiple output formats: default horizontal DAG with box-drawing, --compact (tree-style list), --box (vertical boxes), --dot (Graphviz DOT), --html (D3.js interactive). Our 'bw graph' outputs a text tree and --json. Consider which formats are worth adding. --dot is low-effort and enables piping to Graphviz. --compact could replace our current text output. --html is high-effort but high-value for complex graphs.
title: Evaluate bd graph output formats
